Key Match Events: England win by 10 wickets and with 24 balls to spare
Buttler seals victory with a six
Kohli anchors India with 50 off 40 balls
India slip to 75-3 after losing Rohit and Suryakumar in quick succession
Miscellaneous Highlights: The final is against Pakistan in Melbourne on Sunday (08:00 GMT)
Others: England set the tone for that was to come with a magnificent early burst with the ball
Alex Hartley, former England bowler on BBC Test Match Special, commented on Pakistan's performance in the tournament
Ravi Bopara, former England all-rounder on BBC Test Match Special, praised England's performance
There is a reserve day for the final, but that might mean the early hours of Monday morning in the UK
